name: Magic Knight Rayearth 《CLAMP》
description:
First training attempt!

I have pretty good success using AnythingV4 with DDIM sampler at weight 0.9.

  • Weight: 0.6-0.9 (you can go lower)

  • No inpainting used on preview images.

  • Used Hollowstrawberry's Data Set Maker and Lora Trainer on Google Collabs.

    PROMPTS
    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    NEGATIVE PROMPTS: (may or may not help - depending on what you want:)
    Art nouveau
    2000s \(style\)
    White Background
    Wings
    Close-up
    (Artist name)
    Skinny
    Narrow waist
    Bottomless
    Topless
    Torch
    Border
    Cropped
    Monochrome
    2girls/3girls/multiple girls     <-- (use one or more of these if you want just one character to appear)
